name: Skylight
description: Skylight is a turn-based tactics game of colossal space battles. Comes with VR (Rift/Vive) and non-VR versions! On the bridge of your flagship, a holographic projector shows your fleet floating in space, facing the enemy and awaiting your orders.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 960, equivalent or better Storage: 1 GB available space
